body_html:
We now encourage Windows users to build via bazel instead of CMake. See https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source_windows.

I'll mark this contributions welcome for now in case anyone else has a solution though.
body_text:
We now encourage Windows users to build via bazel instead of CMake. See https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source_windows.
I'll mark this contributions welcome for now in case anyone else has a solution though.
body:
We now encourage Windows users to build via bazel instead of CMake. See https://www.tensorflow.org/install/source_windows.

I'll mark this contributions welcome for now in case anyone else has a solution though.
